sentences.en: a country jealous of its heritage
A loving man is always a jealous man.
sentences.cn: 钟情之人常是妒忌之人.

sentences.en: Are you seriously jealous of Erica?
Danny could be very jealous and possessive about me.
sentences.cn: 丹尼很爱吃醋，对我的占有欲很强。

sentences.en: Douglas was often cruelly tormented by jealous siblings.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯经常被嫉妒他的兄弟姐妹整得很惨。

sentences.en: He was jealous when he discovered that she loved someone else.
sentences.cn: 当他发现她爱别人的时候,他吃醋了.

sentences.en: He's rude to her friends and obsessively jealous.
sentences.cn: 他对她的朋友很无礼而且嫉妒心重。

sentences.en: I worked myself into frenzy plotting ways to make him jealous.
sentences.cn: 我绞尽脑汁，处心积虑，就是为了让他嫉妒。

sentences.en: I'd be ashamed to admit feeling jealous.
sentences.cn: 我不好意思承认自己的嫉妒之心。

sentences.en: I'm very jealous of your new job.
sentences.cn: 我很羡慕你的这个新工作.

sentences.en: She got insanely jealous and there was a terrible fight.
sentences.cn: 她变得过分地猜忌，接着是一场激烈的打斗。

sentences.en: She hates me having any fun and is quite jealous and spoiled.
sentences.cn: 她见不得我开心，嫉妒心强，被惯坏了。

sentences.en: She was jealous of his wealth.
She was jealous, humiliated, and emotionally at the end of her tether.
sentences.cn: 她既忌妒又感到屈辱，感情上已经到了崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: Why are you so jealous of his success?
sentences.cn: 你为什么这么嫉妒他的成功？

sentences.en: You're jealous because the record company rejected your idea.
sentences.cn: 你之所以妒忌是因为唱片公司拒绝接受你的想法。

sentences.en: Young girls sometimes become sulky because they are jealous.
sentences.cn: 少女们因为嫉妒而有时变得很不高兴.

trans.tran_cn: 妒忌的，羡慕的，精心守护的，吃醋的
trans.tran_en: feeling unhappy because someone has something that you wish you had
